description:
Night. Silence. Every creak could give you away. One wrong step — and the alarm will go off.
In Crime Thief Simulator you play as a professional thief for whom time is the greatest enemy. Break into houses, search for valuable items, and decide what’s worth the risk.

Every second counts: the longer you stay inside, the higher the chance of being caught.
Keep an eye on the timer, listen for sounds, avoid lights and surveillance cameras. Plan your escape route in advance — when time runs out, there may be no way back.

Use tools to pick locks and disable security. Each mission tests your patience, reflexes, and instincts.
Will you be able to strip the house down to the last coin and get out before the timer ends?
